title: 2 New Academy Skins
body:
With The New Academy Skins Coming Up, I Had The Idea Of 2 New Skins, A Bully Sion And A Nerdy Ryse.

They Would Go Together Good Because Ryse Has A Book, He Could Be Passed As A nerd.

And Sion Being Big, He Could Have A Skin Looking Like A Bully.

replies.body: I do like the concept but there are already 5 academy skins and I don't really see Riot making any more.
they do detetion in fours at the league academy
well since there is already a professor ryze in the set, im thinking they might give that one a miss
they also have a head-mistress fiora
